channel.title: Blog 1
channel.description: Technology that teaches empathy? How mpathic uses AI to help us listen to each other by Bonnie McClure and Chalaire Miller | on 30 APR 2024 | Startup, Startup Spotlight On a basic human level, we want to be heard. We want to connect with others, and we want to be understood. Unfortunately, weâ€™re often faced with many things competing for our attention, which makes us bad listeners.Danielle Schlosser, Chief Innovation Officer
